body:
So, obviously I am not new here, but i just thought I might do another one of these because my first one was such a great hit! (It was anything but a hit). So I have kinda taken a break to play some CS:GO, but my Steam account has been hacked twice in a week and now I can't even get into it. I just thought I might answer questions and play Attack of the b-team today cos I'm on holidays much like everyone else.

So go ahead!

Nebula is my favorite game mode by far then Nexus, just cos its bananas.
It's not my favorite music, by I can force it down...
I have gambled on CS:GO Lounge, kinda made some moneyz, then gave it up.
I would be a coconut, because I drive everyone nuts :3
Yes they can ._. Didn't see that one coming.
